title: 6/27/17 - The GOP is about to force single payer health care on you (Mark Levin & Brad Thor Join)
description:
An update on what The Supreme Court ruled on yesterday and what's coming next ...Single payer health care around the corner?..."The Great One" Mark Levin discusses the GOP's health care fail, his new book and the TV viewing habits of his dog ...Brad Thor discusses his new book and Jeffy is his inspiration? ...How Brad Thor brings real life into his novels.The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
